content: ***cactuar in a pot a final fantasy inspired amigurumi*** **let s see it run away now it will not start a random encounter and will not bring friends catch it pot it and enjoy it ** happy crocheting **materials required** - 4mm hook - worsted weight yarn in green dark brown and black - yarn needle for sewing - floral / coated wire i used a thick coated wire i got at the hardware store but any medium floral wire will work if it is too thin double strand it - pliers to bend the floral wire - doll stuffing - 3 5 garden pot - piece of scrap cardboard cut in a 3 diameter circle - rocks for weight - black felt - brown pipecleaner - invisible sewing thread
